{"id":437953709,"lang":"python3","time":"5 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1609667815,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"36 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/437953709/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Kth Smallest Instructions","memory":"14.4 MB","code":"from math import perm\n\nclass Solution:\n    def kthSmallestPath(self, destination: List[int], k: int) -> str:\n        # \n        def calc(a, b):\n            return perm(a + b) // (perm(a) * perm(b))\n\n        b, a = destination\n        ans = []\n        while a + b > 0:\n            if a == 0 or b == 0:\n                ans.append('H' * a)\n                ans.append('V' * b)\n                break\n            \n            chooseA = calc(a-1, b)\n\n            if k <= chooseA:\n                a -= 1\n                ans.append('H')\n            else:\n                k -= chooseA\n                ans.append('V')\n                b -= 1\n        return ''.join(ans)","compare_result":"","title_slug":"kth-smallest-instructions"}
